get.description:
Retrieve a comprehensive list of all Clusters associated with a specific connection,
including those mapped between CB-Spider and the CSP,
only registered in CB-Spider's metadata,
and only existing in the CSP.
get.summary: List All Clusters in a Connection

parameters.description: The name of the Connection to list Clusters for
parameters.name: ConnectionName

200.description: List of all Clusters within the specified connection, including clusters in CB-Spider only, CSP only, and mapped between both.

400.description: Bad Request, possibly due to invalid JSON structure or missing fields

get.description:

post.description:
Create a new Cluster with specified configurations. üï∑Ô∏è [[Concept Guide](https://github.com/cloud-barista/cb-spider/wiki/Provider-Managed-Kubernetes-and-Driver-API)]
* NodeGroupList is optional, depends on CSP type:
 - Type-I (e.g., Tencent, Alibaba): requires separate Node Group addition after Cluster creation.
 - Type-II (e.g., Azure, NHN): mandates at least one Node Group during initial Cluster creation.

IsAllDeleted.description: true: all deleted, false: some remained

spider.AccessInfo.description:
Access Information for a Kubernetes Cluster.
Take some time to provide.

spider.AddonsInfo.description: Addons Information for a Kubernetes Cluster

spider.AnyCallInfo.description: This structure holds both the input and output parameters for the AnyCall API.

priceList.description: List of prices for different services/products

CreatedTime.description: The time when the disk was created

KeyValueList.description: Additional key-value pairs associated with this disk

TagList.description: A list of tags associated with this disk

Mem.description: Memory size of the GPU in MB

spider.HealthCheckerInfo.description: Health Checker Information for a Network Load Balancer (NLB)

Interval.description: secs, Interval time between health checks.

Threshold.description: num, The number of continuous health checks to change the VM status.

Timeout.description: secs, Waiting time to decide an unhealthy VM when no response.

spider.HealthInfo.description: Health Information for a Network Load Balancer (NLB)

Fingerprint.description: Unique identifier for the public key

TagList.description: List of tags associated with this KeyPair

spider.ListenerInfo.description: Listener Information for a Network Load Balancer (NLB)

spider.NetworkInfo.description: Network Information for a Kubernetes Cluster

spider.NodeGroupInfo.description: Node Group Information for a Kubernetes Cluster

cspPriceInfo.description: Additional price information specific to CSP

price.description: Price in the specified currency per unit

pricingPolicyInfo.description: Detail information about the pricing policy

unit.description: Unit of the pricing (e.g., per hour)

PurchaseOption.description: Purchase option (e.g., no upfront, partial upfront)

cspProductInfo.description: Additional product information specific to CSP

maxThroughputvolume.description: Maximum throughput for the volume in MB/s

spider.VMGroupInfo.description: VM Group Information for a Network Load Balancer (NLB)

StartTime.description: Timezone: based on cloud-barista server location.

VMSpecName.description: instance type or flavour, etc... ex) t2.micro or f1.micro

KeyValueList.description: Additional key-value pairs for the VM spec

Region.description: Region where the VM spec is available

VCpu.description: CPU details of the VM spec

spider.VMStatus.description: The status of a Virtual Machine (VM).

spider.cim.CloudOSMetaInfo.description: Metadata information related to a Cloud OS, including supported regions, credentials, and disk configurations.

Credential.description: A list of required credential keys.

CredentialCSP.description: A list of credentials required by the cloud service provider (CSP).

DefaultRegionToQuery.description: Default region to use if none is specified for a query.

IdMaxLength.description: Maximum allowed length for IDs in the cloud provider.

Region.description: A list of supported regions by the Cloud OS.

RootDiskType.description: Supported root disk types (e.g., gp2, standard).

spider.cim.ConnectionConfigInfo.description: Information about the connection configuration used to connect to a specific cloud provider.

ConfigName.description: The name of the connection configuration, used as a unique identifier.

CredentialName.description: The name of the credential used for cloud authentication.

DriverName.description: The name of the cloud driver associated with this configuration.

ProviderName.description: The name of the cloud provider (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).

RegionName.description: The name of the region for the cloud connection.

spider.cim.CredentialInfo.description: Information about a specific cloud credential used for authentication.

CredentialName.description: The name of the credential, used as a unique identifier.

KeyValueInfoList.description: A list of key-value pairs, where each entry is a key and its associated value.

ProviderName.description: The name of the cloud provider (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).

spider.cim.CloudDriverInfo.description: Information about a specific cloud driver used in the system.

DriverLibFileName.description: The filename of the driver library, already present in the cloud-driver/libs directory.

DriverName.description: The name of the cloud driver, used as a unique identifier.

ProviderName.description: The name of the cloud provider (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).

spider.cim.RegionInfo.description: Information about a specific cloud region and its associated zones.

AvailableZoneList.description: A list of availability zones within a region.

KeyValueInfoList.description: A list of key-value pairs, where each entry is a key and its associated value.

ProviderName.description: The name of the cloud provider (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).

RegionName.description: The name of the region, used as a unique identifier.

FID.description: Function ID (FID) to call, ex: countAll

IDTransformMode.description: ON: transform CSP ID, OFF: no-transform CSP ID

Version.description: Some CSPs may not support or limit versions.

DiskType.description: gp2 or default, if not specified, default is used

Zone.description: target zone for the disk, if not specified, it will be created in the same zone as the Connection.
